inspection_note: The home, built in 2018, appears to be in good condition with a modern split-level design. The aluminum/vinyl siding is well-maintained, contributing to its energy efficiency. The electric heat pump system is relatively new, likely providing efficient heating and cooling. Windows appear to be double-pane, which should offer good insulation. The full basement could be an area to check for insulation improvements. Overall, the property seems well-equipped with modern energy-efficient features.
